page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: We did a survey to find out about home life in our area.Here is what we found out from asking 100 families from three different schools. In 48% of homes no one smoked and in 42% one person smoked and in 10% two people smoked.32% of homes said they didn't have a pet and 32% said they had one pet,the rest had more than one pet.In 56% of the homes nobody wore glasses but in 35% of the homes one person wore glasses and 9% had two or more people wearing glasses.All of the homes had a television and 60% had a video,50% had a freezer,21% had a microwave and 58% had a telephone. 62% of families said they believed in God.
